summary: After Billy Lo is killed while seeking the murderers of his friend, his brother Bobby goes all out to bring the perpetrators to justice.
cast: Bruce Lee|Tae-jeong Kim|Jang-Lee Hwang|Roy Horan|Roy Chiao|Hoi Sang Lee|Cheng-Wu Yang|Hou Li-Jen|Miranda Austin|Chun-Wah Lee|Wei-Ho Tu|Han-Yuan Ma|Mars|Yun-Chiang Peng|Graham Ravey|Dan Schwarz|Casanova Wong|Biao Yuen|Shun-Yee Yuen
director: Directors: See-Yuen Ng (as Ng See-Yuan), Sammo Kam-Bo Hung (co-director) (uncredited) | 1 more credit »
title: El último combate
